description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Just bought a new TV or projector? Use this new TV calibration utility to see if there are any dead pixels and help calibrate it as the game and movie makers intended it to be. Choose between 3 different categories: Color, pixel and size tests.  As a bonus we also included a controller test so you can test if your xbox controller buttons, thumbsticks and rumble motors work as they should.
description.short: Just bought a new TV or projector? Use this new TV calibration utility to see if there are any dead pixels and help calibrate it as the game and movie makers intended it to be. Choose between 3 different categories: Color, pixel and size tests.  As a bonus we also included a controller test so you can test if your xbox controller buttons, thumbsticks and rumble motors work as they should.
